servicesPage.heroSubtitle: Comprehensive astrological services to guide you through every aspect of life. From birth chart analysis to personalized remedies, {name} offers expert guidance rooted in Vedic wisdom.

process.step3Desc: Receive detailed analysis and personalized guidance
process.step4Desc: Implement suggested remedies for positive transformation

servicesPage.ctaSubtitle: Book a consultation with {name} today and take the first step towards understanding your destiny and making empowered life decisions.

kundaliPage.heroDescription: Your birth chart is a cosmic snapshot of the sky at the moment of your birth. Decode its secrets to understand your life path, karma, and destiny.
kundaliPage.whatIsKundaliDesc1: A Kundali (also known as Janam Kundali, birth chart, or horoscope) is a celestial map that captures the positions of all nine planets at the exact time and place of your birth. This map is divided into 12 houses, each governing different aspects of life.
kundaliPage.whatIsKundaliDesc2: The positions of planets in these houses, their aspects (drishti), and their conjunctions create a unique pattern that influences your personality, relationships, career, health, and overall life journey.
kundaliPage.whatIsKundaliDesc3: provides detailed Kundali analysis, examining all aspects of your birth chart to provide insights and guidance for various life situations.
kundaliPage.requiredInfoDesc: To create an accurate Kundali, we need:
kundaliPage.accurateNote: * Accurate birth time is crucial for precise predictions
kundaliPage.housesDesc: Each house in your Kundali governs specific areas of life
kundaliPage.ctaDesc: Receive a comprehensive analysis of your birth chart from {name}. Understand your planetary positions, doshas, favorable periods, and get personalized guidance for life decisions.

personality.title: Personality Analysis
personality.description: Understanding your core traits, strengths, and areas of improvement based on planetary positions.

career.title: Career Guidance
career.description: Identifying suitable career paths, favorable periods for job changes, and business prospects.

marriage.title: Marriage Compatibility
marriage.description: Gun Milan, Manglik Dosha check, and timing predictions for marriage.

dasha.title: Dasha Analysis
dasha.description: Understanding current and upcoming planetary periods and their effects on your life.

dosha.title: Dosha Analysis
dosha.description: Identification of doshas like Manglik, Kaal Sarp, Pitra Dosha with effective remedies.

transit.title: Transit Effects
transit.description: How current planetary transits are affecting your chart and what to expect.

careerPage.heroDescription: Make informed career and business decisions with expert astrological guidance. Understand the cosmic influences on your professional life and time your important moves for maximum success.
careerPage.careerGuidanceDesc1: Your birth chart holds the key to understanding your professional potential and the best paths to success. The 10th house (Karma Bhava) and its lord, along with planets like Saturn, Sun, and Mercury, reveal important insights about your career trajectory.
careerPage.careerGuidanceDesc2: analyzes your complete horoscope to provide actionable advice on career choices, business ventures, timing of important decisions, and remedies for any obstacles you may face in your professional life.
careerPage.careerGuidanceDesc3: Whether you're a job seeker, entrepreneur, or established professional, our career astrology consultation helps you align your actions with favorable planetary periods for optimal results.
careerPage.consultationDesc: Comprehensive career and business guidance covering all aspects of your professional life
careerPage.influencesDesc: Understanding which planets influence different aspects of your career
careerPage.ctaDesc: provides personalized career and business consultation based on your unique birth chart. Take the right decisions at the right time.
benefits: Identify your ideal career path based on planetary positions
Know the best time for job changes or starting a business
Understand financial cycles and wealth accumulation periods
Remedies for career obstacles and delays
Guidance on investment and financial decisions

growth.title: Career Growth
growth.description: Identify the best periods for promotions, salary hikes, and career advancement based on your planetary transits.

business.title: Business Success
business.description: Get insights on starting a new business, expanding operations, or making strategic investments.

partnership.title: Partnership Analysis
partnership.description: Evaluate business partnership compatibility and identify potential challenges or synergies.

jobChange.title: Job Changes
jobChange.description: Find the most auspicious timing for job interviews, resignations, and new beginnings.

recognition.title: Professional Recognition
recognition.description: Understand when you're likely to receive awards, recognition, or important opportunities.

path.title: Career Path Selection
path.description: Discover which career fields align best with your birth chart and natural talents.

vastuPage.heroDescription: The ancient Indian science of architecture and spatial arrangement. Create harmony between your living space and the cosmic forces for prosperity, health, and peace.
vastuPage.whatIsDesc1: Vastu Shastra is an ancient Indian science that harmonizes architecture with nature's five elements—Earth, Water, Fire, Air, and Space. Dating back over 5,000 years, it provides guidelines for designing spaces that promote positive energy flow.
vastuPage.whatIsDesc2: The fundamental principle of Vastu is that the directions and placement of rooms, furniture, and objects affect the energy of a space, which in turn influences the health, prosperity, and happiness of its occupants.
vastuPage.whatIsDesc3: provides expert Vastu consultation for homes, offices, and commercial spaces. Our practical remedies work without requiring major structural changes, making Vastu accessible to everyone.
vastuPage.tipsDesc: Simple guidelines to bring positive energy into your home
vastuPage.elementsDesc: Vastu is based on the balance of Pancha Mahabhuta (Five Great Elements)
vastuPage.ctaDesc: provides personalized Vastu consultation for your home, office, or business. Get practical remedies without major structural changes.

entrance.title: Main Entrance
entrance.description: The main entrance should ideally face North, East, or Northeast for maximum positive energy flow. Avoid South-West entrances.

livingRoom.title: Living Room
livingRoom.description: Place the living room in the North or East direction. Ensure good natural light and ventilation for positive vibrations.

masterBedroom.title: Master Bedroom
masterBedroom.description: The master bedroom should be in the South-West corner. Place the bed so you sleep with your head towards South.

kitchen.title: Kitchen
kitchen.description: The kitchen should be in the South-East corner (Agni corner). The cook should face East while cooking.

bathroom.title: Bathroom
bathroom.description: Bathrooms should be in the West or North-West direction. Avoid placing them in the North-East corner.

office.title: Office/Study
office.description: Home office or study room should be in the West or South-West. Face North or East while working for better concentration.

marriagePage.heroDescription: Ensure a harmonious and prosperous married life through comprehensive Kundali matching and compatibility analysis based on Vedic astrology principles.
marriagePage.matchingDesc1: In Vedic tradition, marriage is considered a sacred union of two souls. Kundali matching, also known as Horoscope matching or Gun Milan, is the time-tested method to assess compatibility between prospective partners.
marriagePage.matchingDesc2: The system evaluates 36 points (Gunas) across 8 different aspects of life, providing a comprehensive view of how well two individuals will complement each other in marriage. A score of 18 or above is generally considered favorable for marriage.
marriagePage.matchingDesc3: provides detailed Kundali matching analysis that goes beyond just the point score, examining planetary positions, doshas, and providing practical remedies when needed.
marriagePage.kutaDesc: The eight aspects of compatibility that make up the 36-point Gun Milan system
marriagePage.doshasDesc: Understanding common astrological afflictions and their remedies for a harmonious married life
marriagePage.ctaDesc: Take the first step towards a harmonious married life. Consult {name} for comprehensive Kundali matching and expert guidance on marriage compatibility.

gunMilan.title: Gun Milan Analysis
gunMilan.description: Complete 36-point matching with detailed interpretation of each Kuta

doshaDetection.title: Dosha Detection
doshaDetection.description: Identification of Manglik, Nadi, and other marriage-affecting doshas

muhurat.title: Muhurat Selection
muhurat.description: Auspicious date and time selection for engagement and wedding

compatibility.title: Compatibility Report
compatibility.description: Comprehensive report on emotional, physical, and financial compatibility

vashya.name: Vashya
vashya.description: Mutual attraction and control in relationship

manglik.name: Manglik Dosha
manglik.description: When Mars is placed in certain houses (1st, 4th, 7th, 8th, or 12th), it creates Manglik Dosha which can cause delays in marriage or marital discord.

nadi.name: Nadi Dosha
nadi.description: When both partners have the same Nadi (Adi, Madhya, or Antya), it indicates potential health issues for progeny.

bhakoot.name: Bhakoot Dosha
bhakoot.description: Unfavorable moon sign combinations between partners can lead to financial problems or lack of mutual understanding.

tips: Gun Milan score is important but not the only factor—planetary positions and Dasha periods should also be analyzed.
A low score doesn't mean marriage should be avoided; proper remedies can mitigate negative effects.
Both horoscopes should be analyzed for overall life prospects, not just compatibility.
Muhurat (auspicious timing) selection is equally important for a successful married life.
Post-marriage, periodic consultations can help navigate challenging planetary periods together.

numerologyPage.heroDescription: Unlock the hidden meanings in numbers. Discover how the vibrations of numbers influence your personality, destiny, and life path.
numerologyPage.numbersDesc1: Numerology is an ancient science that studies the mystical relationship between numbers and life events. Every number carries a specific vibration that influences various aspects of our existence.
numerologyPage.numbersDesc2: In Vedic numerology, numbers 1-9 are associated with the nine planets, each carrying unique energies and characteristics. Your birth date and name convert into numbers that reveal insights about your personality, strengths, challenges, and destiny.
numerologyPage.numbersDesc3: provides comprehensive numerology consultations, including life path analysis, name corrections, and lucky number identification to help you align with positive vibrations.
numerologyPage.eachNumberDesc: Each number from 1 to 9 carries unique vibrations and meanings
numerologyPage.ctaDesc: Get a comprehensive numerology analysis from {name}. Understand your life path, lucky numbers, and how to align your name with positive vibrations.

1.description: Natural leaders with strong willpower and determination. Creative and innovative.

2.description: Peacemakers who value harmony and partnerships. Intuitive and empathetic.

3.description: Creative communicators with charm and enthusiasm. Artistic and social.

4.description: Builders and organizers who value structure. Reliable and disciplined.

5.description: Dynamic individuals who love change and variety. Curious and adaptable.

6.description: Nurturing souls focused on family and beauty. Caring and artistic.

7.description: Deep thinkers and seekers of truth. Analytical and mysterious.

8.description: Business-minded individuals with strong ambition. Karmic lessons in focus.

9.description: Old souls with universal love. Selfless and spiritually advanced.

lifePath.title: Life Path Number
lifePath.description: Derived from your birth date, reveals your life purpose and the path you're meant to walk.

destiny.title: Destiny Number
destiny.description: Calculated from your full name, shows your life's goals and what you're destined to achieve.

name.title: Name Numerology
name.description: Analysis and correction of names to align with favorable vibrations for success.

business.title: Business Name Analysis
business.description: Select or modify business names for better luck, growth, and prosperity.

mobile.title: Mobile Number Selection
mobile.description: Choose lucky mobile numbers that resonate with your personal vibrations.

lucky.title: Lucky Numbers
lucky.description: Identify your lucky numbers for important dates, decisions, and opportunities.

gemstonesPage.heroDescription: Harness the cosmic energy of precious gemstones to strengthen favorable planets and enhance prosperity, health, and success in your life.
gemstonesPage.ratnaDesc1: In Vedic astrology, gemstones are powerful tools that channel planetary energies. Each gemstone corresponds to a specific planet and can strengthen its positive influences in your birth chart.
gemstonesPage.ratnaDesc2: The Navaratna (nine gems) system aligns with the nine celestial bodies—Sun, Moon, Mars, Mercury, Jupiter, Venus, Saturn, Rahu, and Ketu. When worn correctly, these gemstones can help overcome obstacles, enhance positive traits, and bring balance to your life.
gemstonesPage.ratnaDesc3: provides personalized gemstone recommendations based on detailed birth chart analysis, ensuring you wear the right stone that harmonizes with your planetary positions.
gemstonesPage.navaratnaDesc: The nine precious gemstones representing the nine celestial bodies
gemstonesPage.ctaDesc: Don't wear gemstones without expert guidance. Consult {name} for personalized gemstone recommendations based on your birth chart analysis.

consult.title: Always consult an expert
consult.description: Gemstones should be worn only after proper birth chart analysis. Wrong gemstones can have adverse effects.

quality.title: Quality matters
quality.description: Only natural, untreated gemstones with good clarity provide astrological benefits.

energization.title: Proper energization
energization.description: Gemstones must be energized with proper mantras and worn on auspicious dates for maximum benefits.

weight.title: Right weight
weight.description: The weight of the gemstone should be calculated based on your body weight and birth chart.

pujaPage.heroDescription: Strengthen your planetary positions and overcome life obstacles through powerful Vedic pujas, mantras, and time-tested astrological remedies.
pujaPage.remediesDesc1: In Vedic astrology, remedies play a crucial role in mitigating negative planetary influences and enhancing positive ones. Through pujas, mantras, donations, and other spiritual practices, we can harmonize cosmic energies in our favor.
pujaPage.remediesDesc2: The ancient Rishis developed these remedial measures based on deep understanding of planetary energies and their effects on human life. When performed with proper faith and procedure, these remedies can bring significant positive changes.
pujaPage.remediesDesc3: provides personalized remedy recommendations based on your birth chart analysis, ensuring you receive the most effective solutions for your specific challenges.
pujaPage.pujasDesc: Appease and strengthen planetary energies through dedicated worship rituals
pujaPage.ritualsDesc: Powerful rituals for specific life situations and spiritual growth
pujaPage.ctaDesc: Every individual's chart is unique, and so should be their remedies. Consult {name} for personalized puja and remedy recommendations based on your birth chart analysis.

items: Gayatri Mantra for overall spiritual growth

mahamrityunjaya.name: Mahamrityunjaya Jaap
mahamrityunjaya.description: Powerful prayer to Lord Shiva for protection from untimely death, serious illness, and accidents.
mahamrityunjaya.occasion: Health issues, accidents, fear of death

navgraha.name: Navgraha Shanti Puja
navgraha.description: Worship of all nine planets to balance planetary energies and remove negative influences.

kaalSarp.name: Kaal Sarp Dosh Nivaran
kaalSarp.description: Remedy for Kaal Sarp Yoga when all planets are hemmed between Rahu and Ketu.

pitra.name: Pitra Dosh Nivaran
pitra.description: Pacification of ancestral souls for removing obstacles caused by unfulfilled duties to ancestors.

satyanarayan.name: Satyanarayan Puja
satyanarayan.description: Worship of Lord Vishnu for overall prosperity, happiness, and fulfillment of wishes.

grihaPravesh.name: Griha Pravesh Puja
grihaPravesh.description: Rituals for entering a new home to invoke positive energies and blessings.

vivah.name: Vivah Puja
vivah.description: Wedding ceremonies and pre-wedding rituals as per Vedic traditions.

sunderkand.name: Sunderkand Path
sunderkand.description: Recitation of Sunderkand from Ramcharitmanas for removing obstacles and divine blessings.

processSteps.description: We analyze your Kundali to identify afflicted planets and doshas requiring remedies.
Based on analysis, we suggest the most effective pujas and remedies for your situation.
We identify the most auspicious date and time for performing the recommended puja.
Pujas are performed with proper Vedic procedures by experienced priests.
We provide guidance on daily practices and follow-up remedies for continued benefits.

rudrakshaPage.heroDescription: Experience the divine blessings of sacred Rudraksha beads. Select the right Rudraksha based on your planetary positions for spiritual growth and protection.
rudrakshaPage.rudrakshaDesc1: Rudraksha, meaning "Tears of Lord Shiva," are sacred seeds from the Elaeocarpus ganitrus tree. These powerful beads have been revered for thousands of years for their spiritual and healing properties.
rudrakshaPage.rudrakshaDesc2: Each Rudraksha bead has a specific number of faces or "Mukhis," ranging from 1 to 21. Each type is associated with different deities, planets, and benefits. The number of Mukhis determines which planetary energies the bead can harness.
rudrakshaPage.rudrakshaDesc3: provides expert guidance on selecting the right Rudraksha based on your birth chart, ensuring you receive maximum spiritual and material benefits from these sacred beads.
rudrakshaPage.typesDesc: Each Mukhi Rudraksha has unique properties and benefits based on its ruling deity and planet
rudrakshaPage.ctaDesc: Wearing the wrong Rudraksha can have adverse effects. Consult {name} for personalized Rudraksha recommendations based on your birth chart analysis.

authenticity.title: Authenticity is crucial
authenticity.description: Always purchase Rudraksha from trusted sources. Fake beads provide no benefits and may have negative effects.

energization.title: Proper energization
energization.description: Rudraksha must be energized with proper mantras and rituals before wearing for maximum benefits.

wearing.title: Wearing instructions
wearing.description: Wear Rudraksha in contact with skin, preferably on Monday. Remove during sleep and impure activities.

consult.title: Consult before wearing
consult.description: Different Mukhi Rudrakshas suit different individuals based on their birth chart. Always consult an expert.

wearingSteps: Purify the Rudraksha by washing it with Gangajal or pure water and milk.
Energize it by chanting the appropriate mantra 108 times.
Wear it on a Monday morning during Shukla Paksha for best results.
String the Rudraksha in silk, wool, or gold/silver thread.
Wear it touching your skin for maximum benefits.
Remove during sleep, bathing, and visiting impure places.
Regularly clean and re-energize your Rudraksha every 6 months.

mahuratPage.heroDescription: Begin your important life events at the most auspicious moments. The ancient science of Muhurat helps you align your actions with favorable cosmic energies for success and prosperity.
mahuratPage.muhuratDesc1: Muhurat (also spelled Mahurat or Muhurta) is the auspicious time calculated according to Vedic astrology for starting important activities. It is based on the positions of planets, lunar day (Tithi), constellation (Nakshatra), and other astrological factors.
mahuratPage.muhuratDesc2: In Vedic tradition, it is believed that beginning any significant event during an auspicious Muhurat ensures success, removes obstacles, and brings divine blessings. This ancient practice has been followed for thousands of years across India.
mahuratPage.muhuratDesc3: calculates personalized Muhurats considering your individual birth chart along with the general auspicious timings, ensuring the selected time is favorable specifically for you.
mahuratPage.typesDesc: We provide auspicious timing for all important life events
mahuratPage.panchangDesc: Muhurat is calculated considering these five essential elements of the Hindu calendar
mahuratPage.ctaDesc: provides personalized Muhurat selection considering your birth chart for maximum auspiciousness. Start your important events at the perfect cosmic moment.
benefits: Aligns your actions with favorable cosmic energies
Increases chances of success and positive outcomes
Brings blessings and divine support for new beginnings
Reduces obstacles and ensures smoother proceedings
Creates lasting positive impressions for important events

travel.description: Plan important journeys during favorable planetary alignments for safe and successful travels.

about.title: Meet
about.description1: has guided thousands of individuals on their life paths. His expertise spans across horoscope reading, kundali analysis, numerology, vastu shastra, and gemstone consultation.
about.description2: Based in Rohini, Delhi, he combines ancient Vedic wisdom with practical modern solutions to help clients navigate life's challenges in career, relationships, health, and personal growth.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Life?
cta.subtitle: Book a personalized consultation and get clarity on your life path, career, relationships, and more.

about.title: About
about.description1: is a renowned Vedic astrologer with over {years} years of dedicated practice in astrology, numerology, vastu shastra, and gemstone consultation. Based in Rohini, Delhi, he has helped thousands of individuals navigate life's challenges and make informed decisions.
about.description2: His journey into the mystical world of Vedic astrology began in his early years, inspired by the ancient wisdom passed down through generations. Through years of rigorous study and practice, he has mastered the art of reading celestial patterns and their influence on human life.
about.description3: What sets him apart is his practical approach to astrology. He believes in providing actionable guidance that clients can implement in their daily lives, rather than abstract predictions. His remedies are simple, effective, and rooted in Vedic traditions.

credentials.experienceDesc: Dedicated practice in Vedic astrology and related sciences
credentials.scholarDesc: Deep knowledge of ancient Vedic texts and astrological treatises
credentials.consultationsDesc: Trusted by thousands of clients from India and abroad
credentials.ratingDesc: Consistently high ratings from satisfied clients

expertise.title: Areas of Expertise
expertise.subtitle: With comprehensive knowledge across various branches of Vedic astrology and related sciences, offers guidance in multiple areas to address all aspects of your life.

philosophy.title: Philosophy
philosophy.quote: Astrology is not about predicting a fixed future, but about understanding the cosmic patterns that influence our lives and using that knowledge to make better choices. The stars incline, they do not compel.
philosophy.description: believes in empowering clients with knowledge rather than creating dependency. His consultations focus on practical solutions and positive life changes.

contact.subtitle: Ready to explore your destiny? Get in touch for a personalized consultation. We're here to guide you on your life journey.
